name: craigslist_browse_category
description: Browse a Craigslist category. Returns listings with titles, prices, and locations.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category code (e.g. 'cta' for cars, 'apa' for apartments)

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.cl-search-result, .result-row, .cl-static-search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=20) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.posting-title, a.result-title, a.cl-app-anchor'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.priceinfo, .result-price'); const locEl = el.querySelector('.result-hood, .meta'); results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', url: titleEl?titleEl.href:'', price: priceEl?priceEl.textContent.trim():'', location: locEl?locEl.textContent.trim():'' }); }); return { city: '{{city}}', category: '{{category}}', result_count: results.length, results }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
